description: This file defines the interface for the TelcoVoice Manager module, including function prototypes, include statements, and header guards. It appears to be part of a larger C project related to telecommunication voice management functionalities.

methods.name: TelcoVoiceMgrDmlTelcoVoiceDataSet
methods.description: Sets or updates the telecommunication voice data with provided data buffer and length.

methods.name: TelcoVoiceMgrDmlTelcoVoiceWebConfigInit
methods.description: Initializes the web configuration for the TelcoVoice Manager.

methods.name: getTelcoVoiceDataBlobVersion
methods.description: Retrieves the current version of the telecommunication voice data blob.

methods.name: setTelcoVoiceDataBlobVersion
methods.description: Sets the version number for the telecommunication voice data blob.

methods.name: TelcoVoiceMgr_TelcoVoiceData_Rollback_Handler
methods.description: Handles rollback operations for telco voice data.

methods.name: TelcoVoiceMgr_TelcoVoiceData_Timeout_Handler
methods.description: Handles timeout events related to telco voice data.

methods.name: TelcoVoiceMgr_TelcoVoiceData_Free_Resources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with telco voice data.
